original_text: And he that owneth the house shall come and tell the priest, saying, It seemeth to me there is as it were a plague in the house:
korean_text: 그 집 주인은 제사장에게 가서 말하여 알리기를 무슨 색점이 집에 생겼다 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: And he that owneth the house shall come
there is as it were a plague in the house:
